overview: Five characters in three interwoven stories confront childhood traumas in pursuit of self-redemption.  They all experience a moment of grace; perhaps a turning point in each of their lives, that until now has been a constant struggle to survive.  Yossi and Chris fight for love. Anna and Asaf fight for financial survival, and Elias, a Christian Palestinian who was forced to collaborate with "Shin Bet”, fights for life
title: Ducks, an Urban Legend
